source_description: CLI Auth Module and Commands: Implement the CLI-side authentication for spec-kitty sync. This includes: (1) sync/auth.py module with token obtain/store/refresh functions that call the existing SaaS endpoints (/api/v1/token/, /api/v1/ws-token/), (2) auth login command for user authentication, (3) auth logout command to clear credentials, (4) secure credential storage in ~/.spec-kitty/credentials. This is the P0 blocker extracted from Feature 009.
